text: "Allergic" is a song by American rapper Post Malone. It was sent to alternative radio as the fifth single from Post Malone's third studio album, Hollywood's Bleeding on September 24, 2019. The song was written by Post Malone, Louis Bell, Brian Lee, and Billy Walsh and produced by Louis Bell and Brian Lee. The song peaked at number 37 on the US Billboard Hot 100. ==Critical reception== In a positive review, Max Sea from GQ called the song his favorite off the album, stating that all of the track's sporadic elements manage to work just right.
